Constructor Detail

OAScene

public OAScene(double latitude,
               double longitude,
               java.lang.String name,
               java.lang.String modelID)
Constructor with model id.

Parameters:
latitude - The latitude of the scene
longitude - The longitude of the scene
name - A descriptive name for the scene. i.e. Park or Dairy
idModel - The id of the model to use for this scene in the AR view. Models should be in a folder named by its id, and located in the 3DModels folder under the working path (see OADataManager). The folder containing the model should contain a 3D model file with supported file name (model.obj).

OAScene

public OAScene(double latitude,
               double longitude,
               java.lang.String name,
               com.hitlabnz.androidar.data.ModelData model)
Constructor with custom model data.

Parameters:
latitude - The latitude of the scene
longitude - The longitude of the scene
name - A descriptive name for the scene. i.e. Park or Dairy
model - An instance of ModelData

OAScene

public OAScene(double latitude,
               double longitude,
               java.lang.String name,
               java.util.ArrayList<com.hitlabnz.androidar.data.ModelData> models)
Constructor with multiple models. Be sure to setup the transforms on all the models so they don't intersect with each other. Add all your models to an array list and then pass it to the scene through the models argument.

Parameters:
latitude - The latitude of the scene
longitude - The longitude of the scene
name - A descriptive name for the scene. i.e. Park or Dairy
models - The list of models you want in the scene.
